name: Horizon Info View
description: Application shows location, info and distance to points of interest (POI)
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com; default-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' ; connect-src *; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * data:; frame-src *;font-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline';media-src *
